LanguageData.PangaeaSetting_WildAnimalsDescription: Spawns the extinct animals in the wild.
LanguageData.PangaeaSetting_WildPlantsDescription: Spawns the extinct plants in the wild.
LanguageData.PangaeaSetting_RandomResourceToNullDescr: If a fossil or DNA has nothing assigned to it (for example, a mod was removed mid-game), assign a random one. This will avoid missing textures and useless resources, but means you may get resources you never had before.
LanguageData.PangaeaSetting_CounterIncludesNonStocked: Allow counting non stocked resources in the mod's UI. Enabling this might reduce performance when the UI is open.
LanguageData.PangaeaSetting_EmbryoGrowTimeDescription: The proportion of how long it takes to grow an embryo in a vat compared to usual gestation time.
LanguageData.PangaeaSetting_EmbryoGrowTimeExample: For a {0}, this would change from {1} to {2}.
LanguageData.PangaeaSetting_AgeInEmbryoVatDescription: If true, pawns kept inside a embryo vat may age until they are released.
LanguageData.PangaeaSetting_InstantReleaseFromVatDesc: If true, pawns formed inside vats will be instantly released without player or pawn input.
LanguageData.Pangaea_MissingResourceDescription: The pawn this resource belonged to was probably removed from your game. Sorry D:
LanguageData.Pangaea_GrowingEmbryo: Growing the embryo of a {0}. Progress: {1}
LanguageData.Pangaea_AllowAutoReleaseDescription: Allows pawn to automatically release the pawn within once completed.
LanguageData.Pangaea_AllowAutoFillingDescription: Allows pawn to automatically fill this vat with embryos.
LanguageData.Pangaea_FinishedGrowingMessage: {0} has finished growing in the embryo vat!
LanguageData.Pangaea_AnimalTypeExplanation: The Pangaea category this animal fits into.
LanguageData.Pangaea_ExtinctionStatusExplanation: The extinction status of this organism.
